++++++++++++++  ++  ++++++++++++++      â¤ Package Notes
++++++++++++  ++++    ++++++++++++         â˜ Build the project before opening the model editor.
++++++++++  ++++++++  ++++++++++++         â˜ Documentation can be found @ https://github.com/eXpandFramework/Reactive.XAF/wiki/https://github.com/eXpandFramework/Reactive.XAF/tree/master/src/Modules/RefreshView.
++++++++++  ++++++++++  ++++++++++         â˜ Xpand.XAF.Modules.RefreshView only adds the required references. To register the included packages add the next line/s in the constructor of your XAF module.
++++++++  ++++++++++++++++++++++++              
++++++  ++++++++++++++++++++++++++            RequiredModuleTypes.Add(typeof(Xpand.XAF.Modules.RefreshView.RefreshViewModule));
